query.nsql:
SELECT @SELECT:DIM:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:L:A.UNIQUE_ID:UNIQUE_ID@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:L:A.ID:ID@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:L:A.LOGIN_PCS:LOGIN_PCS@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:L:A.NOM:NOM@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:L:A.PRENOM:PRENOM@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:L:A.TYPE_CONTRAT:TYPE_CONTRAT@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:L:A.TEAM:TEAM@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:L:A.REFERENCE_ANALYTIQUE:REFERENCE_ANALYTIQUE@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:L:A.CODE_PROJET:CODE_PROJET@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:L:A.PHASE:PHASE@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:L:A.INTITULE_TACHE:INTITULE_TACHE@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:L:A.G_DATE:DATE@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:L:A.ANNEE:ANNEE@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:L:A.MOIS:MOIS@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:L:A.JOUR:JOUR@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:L:A.FT_VALIDEE:FT_VALIDEE@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:L:A.CONSOMME:CONSOMME@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:L:A.AM_PM:AM_PM@ FROM ( SELECT md5(R.UNIQUE_NAME || TO_CHAR(REF_ACT.REF_DATE, 'DD_MM_YYYY') || TO_CHAR(REF_ACT.AS_ID)) UNIQUE_ID,
R.UNIQUE_NAME AS ID, R.pcs_id_pcs AS LOGIN_PCS, R.LAST_NAME AS NOM, R.FIRST_NAME AS PRENOM, type_contrat.description TYPE_CONTRAT, REF_OBS.OBS_TEAM_NAME TEAM, REF_OBS.OBS_TEAM_CODE REFERENCE_ANALYTIQUE, CASE WHEN REF_ACT.AS_ID < 0 THEN 'ABSENCE' ELSE REF_PRJ.PRJ_CODE END CODE_PROJET,
CASE WHEN REF_ACT.AS_ID < 0 THEN 'Absence' ELSE REF_PRJ.PHASE_NAME END PHASE,
CASE WHEN REF_ACT.AS_ID < 0 THEN 'Absence' ELSE REF_PRJ.TASK_NAME END INTITULE_TACHE,
TO_CHAR(REF_ACT.REF_DATE, 'DD/MM/YYYY') G_DATE, TO_CHAR(REF_ACT.REF_DATE, 'YYYY') ANNEE, TO_CHAR(REF_ACT.REF_DATE, 'MM') MOIS, TO_CHAR(REF_ACT.REF_DATE, 'DD') JOUR,
2 AS FT_VALIDEE,
REF_ACT.ACT / 8 CONSOMME,
CASE WHEN REF_ACT.AS_ID = -1 THEN 'AM' WHEN REF_ACT.AS_ID = -2 THEN 'PM' WHEN REF_ACT.AS_ID = -3 THEN 'AM_PM' ELSE '' END AM_PM FROM PRTimeSheet TS inner join ODF_RESOURCE_V2 R on (R.ODF_PK = TS.prResourceID)
left join cmn_lookups_v type_contrat on type_contrat.lookup_type = 'SRM_RESOURCE_TYPE' and type_contrat.ID = R.PERSON_TYPE and type_contrat.language_code = 'fr'
left join ( SELECT OA.RECORD_ID UNIT_ID, OBS_Team.OU_NAME OBS_TEAM_NAME, substring(OBS_Team.CODE from 3) OBS_TEAM_CODE FROM PRJ_OBS_ASSOCIATIONS OA inner join PRJ_OBS_UNITS OU on (OA.UNIT_ID = OU.ID) inner join prj_obs_types OT on (OU.type_id = OT.ID AND OT.unique_name = 'Organisation')
left join ( SELECT OBF.unit_id UNIT_ID, OU.unique_name CODE, OU.name OU_NAME FROM prj_obs_units_flat OBF inner join prj_obs_units OU on (OU.id = OBF.branch_unit_id and OU.DEPTH = 4) ) OBS_Team ON (OU.ID = OBS_Team.UNIT_ID ) WHERE OA.TABLE_NAME = 'SRM_RESOURCES' ) REF_OBS ON (R.ODF_PK = REF_OBS.UNIT_ID)
inner join PRTimePeriod TP on (TP.prID = TS.prTimePeriodID)
inner join ( SELECT D.TS_ID, D.REF_DATE, CASE WHEN (D.T_AM > 0) and (D.T_PM > 0) THEN 8 WHEN (D.T_AM = 0) and (D.T_PM = 0) THEN 0 ELSE 4 END ACT, CASE WHEN (D.T_AM > 0) and (D.T_PM > 0) THEN -3 WHEN (D.T_AM > 0) THEN -1 WHEN (D.T_PM > 0) THEN -2 ELSE 0 END AS_ID FROM ( SELECT TS.prID TS_ID, DT.START_DATE REF_DATE, NK_SUM_FCT(ODA.odf_nk_ctv_abs,DT.START_DATE, DT.FINISH_DATE) T_AM, NK_SUM_FCT(ODP.odf_nk_ctv_abs,DT.START_DATE, DT.FINISH_DATE) T_PM FROM PRTimeSheet TS
LEFT JOIN odf_ca_co_absences ODA on (ODA.ODF_PARENT_ID = TS.prResourceID AND ODA.CODE='AM') LEFT JOIN odf_ca_co_absences ODP on (ODP.ODF_PARENT_ID = TS.prResourceID AND ODP.CODE='PM')
INNER JOIN PRTimePeriod TP ON (Tp.prID = TS.prTimePeriodID) CROSS JOIN unnest(PFM_DEFAULT_CALENDAR_FCT( Tp.prStart, 'DAY', CAST(Tp.prFinish AS DATE) - CAST(Tp.prStart AS DATE) )) DT
) D WHERE D.T_AM > 0 OR D.T_PM > 0
UNION ALL
SELECT TE.PRTimeSheetID TS_ID, SL.SLICE_DATE REF_DATE, SL.SLICE AS ACT, TE.PRAssignmentID AS_ID FROM PRTimeEntry TE INNER JOIN PRJ_BLB_SLICES SL on (SL.PRJ_OBJECT_ID = TE.prID) INNER JOIN PRJ_BLB_SLICEREQUESTS SLR on (SLR.ID = SL.SLICE_REQUEST_ID)
INNER JOIN PRAssignment A on (A.prID = TE.prAssignmentID) INNER JOIN PRTask T on (T.prID = A.prTaskID) INNER JOIN INV_INVESTMENTS I on (I.ID = T.prProjectID) WHERE SLR.REQUEST_NAME = 'TS_EXTRACTION' AND I.IS_ACTIVE = 1
) REF_ACT on (REF_ACT.TS_ID = TS.prID)
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.prID AS_ID, I.CODE PRJ_CODE, T.prNAME TASK_NAME, TP.prNAME PHASE_NAME FROM PRAssignment A INNER JOIN PRTask T on (A.prTaskID = T.prID) INNER JOIN INV_INVESTMENTS I on (I.ID = T.prProjectID)
INNER JOIN ( SELECT TR.prID reftask_ID, MAX(T.prWBSSequence) WSSeq FROM PRTask T INNER JOIN PRTask TR ON (T.prProjectID = TR.prProjectID AND T.prWBSSequence <= TR.prWBSSequence) WHERE T.prWBSLevel = 1 GROUP BY TR.prID ) PTask ON (Ptask.reftask_ID = T.prID)
INNER JOIN PRTask TP ON (TP.prProjectID = T.prProjectID AND TP.prWBSSequence = PTask.WSSeq)
WHERE I.IS_ACTIVE = 1
) REF_PRJ ON (REF_ACT.AS_ID = REF_PRJ.AS_ID) WHERE TS.prStatus > 2 and TS.prStatus < 5 ) A WHERE @FILTER@
